example.text: Instead of unifying vulnerable children with family who are here legally, the MAGA #ChildDeportationAct jails the lucky ones indefinitely in overcrowded detention facilities. The unlucky ones will be delivered straight to criminal traffickers across the border. [[url]]
Democrats put #PeopleOverPolitics to prevent a default on our debt. I signed on to force a vote on legislation to stop this manufactured crisis. It’s time for my Republican colleagues to join us.
Love must always win. These are only a few victories that Democrats and President Biden delivered to our community.

Instead of unifying vulnerable children with family who are here legally, the MAGA #ChildDeportationAct jails the lucky ones indefinitely in overcrowded detention facilities. The unlucky ones will be delivered straight to criminal traffickers across the border. [[url]]

Let’s thanks all the teachers who believed in, challenged, and inspired us. I’m proud to recently cosponsor a Congressional resolution celebrating #NationalTeacherAppreciationWeek and the vital role they play in our nation's future. [[url]]

No one should live under relentless rocket fire. I #StandWithIsrael as it defends itself from Iran-backed terrorists. I can't imagine the loss of life & devastation w/o our support for Iron Dome defenses. Our investments in ? ?’s security & regional stability saves civilian lives.

Instead of unifying vulnerable children with family who are here legally, the MAGA #ChildDeportationAct jails the lucky ones indefinitely in overcrowded detention facilities. The unlucky ones will be delivered straight to criminal traffickers across the border. [[url]]
